1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Derivied types.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Type
6 ( Eith,
7   uneith,
8   Map, ManyMap,
9   Test, Test2,
10 ) where
11
12-- | Homotype 'Either'.
13type Eith a = Either a a
14
15-- | Extract 'Eith' content.
16uneith :: Eith a -> a
17uneith (Left x)   = x
18uneith (Right x)  = x
19
20-- | Map from something to same type.
21type Map a = a -> a
22
23-- | Map from something to list of something.
24type ManyMap a = a -> [a]
25
26-- | Boolean-valued function, also called predicate.
27type Test a = a -> Bool
28
29-- | Boolean-valued function with 2 arguments.
30type Test2 a b = a -> b -> Bool
31
